ROOT.GetStationInfoSX: select s.CLOUDID as ID,v.CODE as VOLTAGE_TYPE from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaOtherSX B_STATION_SX s join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaOtherSX B_VOLTAGE b on s.maxvoltage = b.v_id join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on b.VOLTAGEDESC=v.NAME where s.CLOUDID is not null
